items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most flattering cut and gorgeous jersey dress
items.body: Buy this dress!! It is double layered with full Lining so not see through! I wore it to awards party and received soooo many compliments. May bet it in other colors as well. Get the shape wear and go for it! Pin comes off hip and looks like a several hundred dollar dress. Made me feel confident!! Read more
items.author: These are cheap and fall apart quickly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: The dress is just like the pictures, it’s really soft and thick. I got the white in a large and it was a little see through but nothing that a girdle or slip couldn’t fix. The dress is tight. I’m 35 weeks pregnant, about 200lbs, 36dd and was still able to fit into the large but my arms got stuck when taking it off lol so if you’re worried about that I would size up. Other than that the dress fit perfectly, feels like a high quality dress. Read more
items.author: Brittany Harris

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: Very cheaply made and the fit is drape. Do not recommend for small frames even xsmall. Read more
items.author: Adam S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress with a flaw
items.body: The dress is stunning. It looks very expensive I am so sad it didn't work for me. The opening of the dress for the head is extremely narrow. If you are having your hair and makeup done before putting on the dress it would ruin your hair and makeup. It really needs a zipper in the back. For reference I am 120 lbs and I ordered a medium and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Mara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money and it fits true to size
items.body: Perfect fit. Very stretchy durable fabric. Not see through. Perfect for a minimalist wedding dress or church or night out. I was comfortable in my dress all day , thick yet very smooth on the skin. Read more
items.author: Tecia Robb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress that is well worth the price.
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. It is well made and the material is so soft. However, it runs small and I had to order two sizes up. Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tucked long dress
items.body: The style & quality of egress was very nice. Wish it would have had a zipper to make it easier to get on & off. Otherwise it looked & fit great. True to dixe Read more
items.author: Cm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: Great quality. It was just a bit tight, but if you are okay with tight clothing order the size suggested on the chart Read more
items.author: Amazing Maids

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
